short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance messaging with WhatsChatEnhancer. Offers features for privacy, personalization, and security for a better chat experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟 WhatsEnhancer: Privacy & User Experience Enhancer 🌟

Enhance your messaging world with the "WhatsEnhancer" Google Chrome extension, designed to boost privacy and enrich your user experience on messaging platforms. Here's what it offers:

🕵️ Blur Names: Obscures displayed names for an added privacy layer.
🖼️ Blur Profile Pics: Keeps identities private by blurring contact images, ideal for public spaces.
💬 Blur Recent Messages: Protects recent message previews from snooping eyes.
🗨️ Blur Conversation Messages: Secures the content of your chats within the conversation window.
👍 Enable Like Button: React quickly with an easy-to-use 'Like' button.
📄 Enable Copy Message Button: Simplifies message copying, enhancing convenience.
🤝 Enable Conversation with Unknown: Start chats with unsaved numbers, offering greater communication flexibility.
📦 Show Archive Button: Keep chats tidy by easily archiving conversations.
📌 Show Pin Conversation Button: Pin vital chats for swift access.
📋 Keep Contact Info Open: Always keep contact details and shared media within reach.
❌ Show Clear Conversation Button: Manage and clear chat history quickly for enhanced privacy.
🎨 Enable Custom Chat Wallpaper: Personalize your chat space with a unique wallpaper.
🔒 Lock Enabled: Secure your messaging app against unauthorized access with a lock feature.

Overall, WhatsEnhancer is dedicated to enriching your messaging experience, focusing on privacy enhancement, user experience personalization, and offering useful functionalities to elevate your daily interactions.
